# Contact Details

Have inquiries or need support? Reach out to us through our contact channels. Whether you’re seeking general information, need assistance, or want to explore partnership opportunities, we’re here to help.

Follow us on [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/company/communities-for-open-research-synthesis){target="_blank"}


COReS is coordinated by [CAMARDES Berlin, BIH QUEST Center](https://www.bihealth.org/en/quest/service/service/camarades-facility-for-the-systematic-review-and-meta-analysis-1){target="_blank"}.

For direct enquiries, please contact: [camarades.berlin@charite.de](mailto:camarades.berlin@charite.de)



# Our Team

We're focused on making COReS the best open community platform it can be. Is there something you absolutely like or would like us to change? Let us know!
